content: 关于是怎么了解到hugo的已经被忘记了，就记得hugo比hexo好用，然后就开始用了。
title: hugo博客使用笔记

content:
配置变量说明官网链接： Front Matter Variables
模板  YAML, identified by ‘---’.  --- author: title: description: date: 2020-00-00 slug: image: categories: - tags: - （四个空格，不要用两个tab） ---  TOML, identified by ‘+++’.  +++ author = "" title = "" description = "" date = "2020-00-00" slug = "" image = "" categories = [ "" ] tags = [ "" ]  JSON, a single JSON object which is surrounded by ‘{’ and ‘}’, each on their own line.  { "author": "" "title": "" "description": "" "date": "2020-00-00" "slug": "" "image": "" "categories": [ "" ] "tags": [ "" ] }
title: 文章配置
